short_description: sempre ghiotti is a fruit & vegetable market based in aragona, italy.
long_description: the i sempre ghiotti product line was born thanks to the initiative of a group of young entrepreneurs with the common goal of creating a modern and dynamic company in the catering and restaurant sector. giving a unique experience through frozen food is our daily challenge. artisan production without the use of additives and immediate freezing at -40 are the added value that defines the high quality of the i sempre ghiotti line. we are responding promptly to a demand that crosses regional and national borders using classic commercial channels (retail, ho.re.ca. and large-scale distribution). la linea di prodotti i sempre ghiotti nasce grazie all'iniziativa di un gruppo di giovani imprenditori con l'obiettivo comune di creare un'azienda moderna e dinamica nel settore catering e ristorazione. regalare un'esperienza unica attraverso il frozen food è la nostra sfida quotidiana. nell'attuale scenario economico dominato dall'online, il sito si configura come una vetrina virtuale dei nostri prodotti, un ponte di collegamento tra realtà già vicine a noi e tra quelle che vorranno esserlo.
business_tags: appetizers | gastronomy | ready made meals | frozen foods | gluten free | traditional recipes | cuttlefish | entree plates | raw ingredients | mediterranean diet | gift an experience | virtual showcase | industrial park | second courses | convenience food
generated_description: i sempre ghiotti is a company based in aragona, sicily, specializing in the production of frozen food products. founded by a group of young entrepreneurs, the company aims to provide a unique dining experience through high-quality, artisanal frozen foods. their product line includes appetizers, first courses, main courses, and gastronomic items, all designed to bring authentic sicilian flavors to tables worldwide. i sempre ghiotti emphasizes the use of traditional production methods without additives and immediate freezing at -40°c to maintain food authenticity. the company serves a diverse market through retail, hospitality, and large-scale distribution channels.
generated_business_tags: ready-made products | mediterranean diet | catering services | artisanal production without artificial additives | frozen food manufacturing | freshly baked vegetables | local produce | instant freezing at -40°c
